text: Pan Honghai (1942 – 3 January 2023) was a Chinese oil painter. He studied at the China Academy of Art. He served as deputy editor-in-chief of and was president and honorary president of Zhejiang Academy of Painting.中国名人研究院编; 异天, 戈德主编. 中国当代艺术界名人录. 北京: 社会科学文献出版社, 1993 Honghai died in Hangzhou on 3 January 2023. ==References== Category:20th-century Chinese painters Category:1942 births Category:2023 deaths Category:People from Shanghai Category:People from Zhejiang Category:21st-century Chinese painters
title: Pan Honghai
